pages.text: Everywhere it rattles and fizzles, whistles and smokes. An ensemble of Assemblage.$(br2)Surely a few of those machines will come in handy.
$(thing)Colored Leaves$() can be crushed, yielding $(thing)Pigment$() and $(thing)Colored Saplings$()
Crushing $(thing)Colored Logs$() results in a nice yield of $(thing)Pigment$().
$(l:resources/quitoxic_reeds)Quitoxic Reeds$() can be ground into powder easily.
Milling $(thing)Gemstone Shards Yields$() results in a higher amount of $(thing)Gemstone Powder$() compared crushing them with an Anvil.
